Parameters.name: lobbyId
Parameters.description: the ID of the lobby you are in

Parameters.name: userId
Parameters.description: the ID of the user who sent the message

Parameters.name: channelId
Parameters.description: the channel the message was sent on

SearchFilter Object.name: value
SearchFilter Object.description: the value of the metadata key to validate against

SearchFilter Object.name: cast
SearchFilter Object.description: the type to cast value as

SearchFilter Object.name: comparison
SearchFilter Object.description: how to compare the metadata values

SearchSort Object.name: key
SearchSort Object.description: the metadata key on which to sort lobbies that meet the search criteria

SearchSort Object.name: cast
SearchSort Object.description: the type to cast value as

SearchSort Object.name: near_value
SearchSort Object.description: the value around which to sort the key
